home.bio: I am Ariel Nogueroles, a software developer with a profound passion for creating technological solutions and a growing specialization in cybersecurity. My journey, forged in the demanding world of metallurgy, has endowed me with an unbreakable discipline, meticulous attention to detail, and an innate ability to solve complex problems. These qualities, now fully dedicated to code, allow me to approach each programming project with engineering precision and tireless dedication, transforming challenges into efficient algorithms and robust systems. My goal is to build the digital future, line by line, with the same solidity and reliability required in materials engineering.

about.title: About Me
about.paragraph1: My professional career began in a very different field from technology. I served in the army, where I developed strong discipline and a great sense of responsibility. Later, I worked in the metallurgy industry, a sector that taught me the importance of precision and attention to detail.
about.paragraph2: However, my true passion was always technology. I decided to make a career change and entered the world of programming and cybersecurity. Today, I apply the same dedication and rigor that I learned in my previous experiences to build quality software and protect systems.
